name: Mouse: A Knight's Tail
description:
Mouse: A Knight's Tail is a platformer game with a unique controller twist! The game is completely controlled by your mouse! Hold your mouse with both hands to easily play the game, Or you can play single-handed once you have learned the controls!

The game follows a knight trapped in dangerous terrain. Treasure waits for you at the end of the tunnel... How fast and accurate can you be?

Scroll Up = Shoot

Middle Click = Jump

Left Click = Move Left

Right Click = Move Right
